构造方法详细信息

MenuList

public MenuList()
方法详细信息

addSeparator

public void addSeparator(int index)
Adds a separator at the specified position

参数：
index - position to add a separator

addSeparator

public void addSeparator()
Adds a separator at the end of the list

参数：
index - position to add a separator

handleInput

protected boolean handleInput(InputChar ch)
从类 Widget 复制的描述
The method is called by framework to let the widget handle an input char. Schould be overrided be derived classes, if these can handle input.

覆盖：
类 List 中的 handleInput
返回：
true, if the widget has handled the char, false in other case

isSelectable

protected boolean isSelectable(int index)
从类 List 复制的描述
This method tests, if the item at the specified position can be selected and invoked at all. The sense is, to give derived classes the posssibility to implement 'separators'. Here returns always true.

覆盖：
类 List 中的 isSelectable
参数：
index - the position to test
返回：
true if the item at the specified position can be selected and invoked, false otherwise

getItemRepresentation

protected java.lang.String getItemRepresentation(java.lang.String item)
从类 List 复制的描述
The method returns the display representation of the string und is called by the widget before it paints an item. The idea is to make it possible in derived classes to paint other strings as managed in the widget. Here returns always the same string as item

覆盖：
类 List 中的 getItemRepresentation
参数：
item - string to give display representation
返回：
display representation of the string

getSeparatorString

public java.lang.String getSeparatorString()
Returns the text used by painting separators

返回：
separator string

setSeparatorString

public void setSeparatorString(java.lang.String value)
Sets the text to use by painting separators

参数：
value - separator string

getPreferredSize

protected Rectangle getPreferredSize()
从类 Widget 复制的描述
This method gives the widget container the infomation about the preferred size of this widget. Must be implemented by derived classes.

覆盖：
类 List 中的 getPreferredSize
